name: Odd One Out 3 Online Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which musical instrument does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Trumpet.

	All the others are woodwind instruments.

questions.text: Which one of these does not belong here, governmentally speaking?
questions.explanation:
Miami.

	Miami is not a state capital. All the rest are.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a dwelling?
questions.explanation:
Topi.

	A topi is a hat in Urdu.

questions.text: One of the following trees does not belong. Name it?
questions.explanation:
Cedar.

	The cedar tree is coniferous.

questions.text: Which of the following animals does not belong in the same category BREED?
questions.explanation:
Hyena.

	Hyenas are not members of the canid (dog) or felid (cat) families. Instead, they are so unique that they have a family all their own, Hyaenidae.

questions.text: In terms of cartoon series, name the character that is the odd one out as it is NOT a Looney Tunes character.
questions.explanation:
Mickey Mouse.

	The others are Looney Tunes characters.

questions.text: Which snake does not belong in terms of how it kills its prey?
questions.explanation:
Python.

	The python is the only one that is not venomous.

questions.text: One of the following countries does not belong, based on its location. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Honduras.

	Honduras is in Central America while the others are in Africa.

questions.text: Name the animal that is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Toad.

	The toad is an amphibian while the others are reptiles.

questions.text: Which of the following is not a culinary herb?
questions.explanation:
Arabica.

	It is a type of coffee.
